code: @Override protected void doStart() throws Exception {     super.doStart().     if (enableRoleChangeEvents) {         LOG.debug("Connecting roleListener : {} to the cluster: {}.", roleListener, clusterName).         raftHandle.addRoleListener(roleListener).     }     endpoint.connect(). }

@Override protected void doStop() throws Exception {     if (enableRoleChangeEvents) {         LOG.debug("Closing connection to cluster: {} from roleListener: {}.", clusterName, roleListener).         raftHandle.removeRoleListener(roleListener).     }     endpoint.disconnect().     super.doStop(). }
